html: The concluding section of the poem describes still a further fall of Satan. "All the kings of the nations, even all of them," will be given some degree of glory in the houses or mansions which they have prepared themselves to receive. Satan will not receive any glory, however, but will be cast into outer darkness. This doctrine is enlarged upon in D&C 88:21-35 (see also D&C 77:8; 133:73).
